10 The Interactive Editor

10.5 Source control with Visual SourceSafe

Note: This section only applies to the Enterprise Edition of Functional Developer.

To simplify the process of working with files under source control, the Functional Developer editor provides an interface to Microsoft's Visual SourceSafe, an external source code control system. This section describes the editor interface to Visual SourceSafe. (For information on using Visual SourceSafe, see Visual SourceSafe documentation.)

10.5.1 - What is the editor's source control interface?
10.5.2 - The SourceSafe menu commands
